conversations.content: What is the longest river entirely within Arizona?
The Little Colorado River, at approximately 315 miles (507 km) long, is the longest river entirely within Arizona.
Which river is responsible for carving the Grand Canyon?
The Colorado River is responsible for carving the Grand Canyon.
Name a major tributary of the Colorado River in Arizona.
The Gila River is a major tributary of the Colorado River in Arizona.
Which river flows through Phoenix, Arizona?
The Salt River flows through Phoenix, Arizona.
What river forms part of Arizona's western boundary?
The Colorado River forms part of Arizona's western boundary.
Which river is known for its turquoise-colored waterfalls in Arizona?
Havasu Creek is known for its turquoise-colored waterfalls in Arizona.
What is the primary river flowing through Tucson, Arizona?
The Santa Cruz River is the primary river flowing through Tucson, Arizona.
Which river in Arizona is a significant tributary to the Gila River?
The San Pedro River is a significant tributary to the Gila River in Arizona.
Name a river in Arizona that is part of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
The Verde River in Arizona is part of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
Which river in Arizona has its headwaters in the White Mountains?
The Black River has its headwaters in Arizona's White Mountains.
